alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 1:16PM CST until January 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow this afternoon with snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour. Snow will end from west to east this evening. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. North winds gusting as high as 45 mph this afternoon into this evening. * WHERE...Portions of east central, northeast and southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel is expected to be very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall rates at times this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon and tonight could also significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds and heavy snow may also lead to isoalted power outages. The hazardous conditions will impact at least portions of this evening`s commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
